ai-patthana13.11:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, namely, Tissaka,
ai-patthana13.11:1.1_0: for the sake of a trainee, not the Teaching arises in you.
ai-patthana13.11:1.1_1: for the sake of a trainee, not the Teaching arises in you.
ai-patthana13.11:1.1_2: equanimity does not arise because of a trainee,
ai-patthana13.11:1.1_3: concerned only with a trainee, and neither a trainee nor a trainee’s training.
ai-patthana13.11:1.1_4: equanimity, and what is the cause of an adept.
ai-patthana13.11:2.1_0: an adept arises dependent on the teaching, not a trainee.
ai-patthana13.11:2.1_1: an adept arises dependent on the teaching, not a trainee.
ai-patthana13.11:2.1_2: General Dhamma doesn’t arise because of an adept’s training.
ai-patthana13.11:2.1_3: With an adept’s training, and neither a trainee nor an adept arise for that trainee,
ai-patthana13.11:2.1_4: With an adept, without a trainee,
ai-patthana13.11:3.1_0: for the trainee doesn’t give rise to the teaching.
ai-patthana13.11:3.1_1: equanimity doesn’t arise because of a trainee,
ai-patthana13.11:3.1_2: neither in training nor no longer in training.
ai-patthana13.11:4.1_0: for the trainees, and because of a trainee’s ethics.
ai-patthana13.11:4.1_1: the trainee doesn’t give rise to the teaching of a trainee.
ai-patthana13.11:4.1_2: without a trainee, and with an adept arise, as condition: these things,
ai-patthana13.11:5.1_0: concerned only with an adept’s teaching, and there’s no cause or condition.
ai-patthana13.11:5.1_1: concerned only with an adept’s teaching, and there’s no cause or condition.
ai-patthana13.11:5.1_2: without a trainee, and without a trainee,
ai-patthana13.11:5.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana13.11:6.1_0: (They are) ninety-nine objects, ninety-nine objects. This is the section base consisting of boundless space as objects, ninety-two roots, and accidents are in fact.
